channel.title: privacy on A Developer's Experience
channel.description: Recent content in privacy on A Developer's Experience

item.title: For a better Signal (Part 1)
item.description: Signal is undisputedly the gold standard of chat messengers, especially for the staunch privacy-conscious. Signal gets its gold star for its security/privacy aspects. Nothing to argue in that regard. However, I would rate Signal very low when it comes to user friendliness. Read the post find out why.

item.title: Degooling
item.description: A rundown of alternatives for degoogling based on recent conversations with friends and acquaintances. There are alternatives that are user privacy friendly, and some of them free. Besides, do not get emotionally attached to a name. Brand names are not functionalities. Don’t hesitate to ditch a product/company in the case of foul play.
